In England, in the seven days to 26 March, there were 494,140 new confirmed cases (873.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 March, there were 470,928 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 5% (23,212 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 March is 17,804,704 (31,484.8 cases per 100,000 population).
